ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description: This library is aimed as a simple, minimal yet powerful logging library for all Python apps. This logging library aims to take away all the disadvantages of using the default logging library and at the same time be feature filled so that the end user feels powerful using it.
about.summary: Simple, minimal, powerful logging library for Python

about.description: This library is aimed as a simple, minimal yet powerful logging library for all Python apps. This logging library aims to take away all the disadvantages of using the default logging library and at the same time be feature filled so that the end user feels powerful using it.
about.summary: Simple, minimal, powerful logging library for Python

name: simber
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "simber" %}
{% set version = "0.2.6" %}


package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/simber-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f0066cca841b5e9658843fb3b560bd5f68909a42cf0b520b49fc8c8e1c0a0e35

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools
  run:
    - colorama
    - python >={{ python_min }}

test:
  imports:
    - simber
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  dev_url: https://github.com/deepjyoti30/simber
  summary: Simple, minimal, powerful logging library for Python
  license: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  home: https://github.com/deepjyoti30/simber
  doc_url: https://simber.deepjyoti30.dev/
  description: This library is aimed as a simple, minimal yet powerful logging library for all Python apps. This logging library aims to take away all the disadvantages of using the default logging library and at the same time be feature filled so that the end user feels powerful using it.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - HeavyTony2
